name: EventNative
description: The easiest event capturing in the world. Please, read the guide before deploying: https://docs.eventnative.org/deployment/deploy-on-heroku

SERVER_AUTH.description: API secret token. Use any random string without whitespaces and save it. Later on you'll need it for JavaScript snippet

SERVER_PUBLIC_URL.description: Your heroku application URL. Please use the same name you choose above

GEO_MAXMIND_PATH.description: Http url to hosted MaxMind db file if you want to enable geo resolution (leave empty otherwise). Read more about geo: https://dev.eventnative.org/geo-data-resolution

DESTINATIONS_JSON.description: JSON config for destination (example value is given for RedShift). Please, read documentation first! https://dev.eventnative.org/deployment/deploy-on-heroku

LOG_SHOW_IN_SERVER.description: Turn this on if you want to see all JSON events in console log. Attention! It may significantly degrade performance, use for debugging purposes only
